overview.en:
XMMT uses the concept of de-centralization, based on the block chain of content completely open and transparent in front of readers, to create a free speech, 
        high-quality development of the media platform. In order to better promote the development of the platform, XMMT has set up a fair reward mechanism for each.
A node that contributes ecologically is constantly rewarded with the XMMT Token approach. Our token will not be issued, and the number of tokens will exceed 17000.
overview.zh:
XMMT 使用去中心化理念,基于区块链上的内容完全公开透明的呈现在读者面前，共同打造一个言论自由，高质量发展的媒体平台。为了更好的推进平台发展，XMMT 设置了公平的奖励机制，让每
一个在生态内做贡献的节点不断收益，用 XMMT Token 的方式作为对这些节点的奖励。我们这个代币不会增发，并且代币的拥有者已经超过了17000人。
